heading: State-of-the-Art Manufacturing
content: Equipped with Milacron injection molding machines for high-quality PET preforms with smooth finishes.

heading: High Production Capacity
content: With a production capacity of 100 million preforms per month, we cater to both local and international market.

heading: Stringent Quality Control
content: We adhere to ISO 9001, 14001,  45001, and ISO 22000 certifications, implementing strict quality measures.

heading: Innovative and Sustainable Solutions
content: We continuously invest in R&D to develop innovative, lightweight preforms that maintain strength.
